China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 23 日星期五 10:01:18 GMT 120
China says it aims to 'contain' foreign interference over Taiwan this yearChina aims to "contain" foreign interference over Taiwan and "resolutely combat" any efforts towards the island's formal independence this year, which is the sensitive 75th anniversary of the founding of communist China, state media said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 09:31:36 GMT VL2C7LQXG5KIVN7YYMOINMVPTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-aims-to-contain-foreign-interference-over-taiwan-this-year-2024-02-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
Tesla to fix software in 8,700 vehicles in China product recall, regulator saysChina's market regulator said on Friday that Tesla Inc would fix software in 8,700 vehicles to reduce the chance of accidents. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 08:43:06 GMT RNHQRTG5GZPCPPN4S7MAM7HTLU https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/tesla-fix-software-8700-vehicles-china-product-recall-regulator-says-2024-02-23/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: In a first, Chinese developer's creditors plan to sue state-owned shareholder for duesA group of offshore creditors of China South City is set to file a lawsuit against the debt-laden developer's biggest state-owned shareholder for dues, four sources said, in what would be the first such case in the crisis-hit property sector. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:43:38 GMT LERHR75EPBLWROOI7投票https://www.reuters.com/world/china/first-chinese-developers-creditors-plan-sue-state-owned-shareholder-dues-2024-02-23/Yu Xie世界中国
Brunei's GallopAir, buyer of COMAC planes, eyes year-end launchBrunei-based airline startup GallopAir hopes to start operations by the end of 2024 should Brunei's aviation regulator approve the regional jet made by Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC it wants to fly in time, the carrier's chief executive said. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:21:49 GMT HM76O7WNDJJMRCXXA7726H3MZQ https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/bruneis-gallopair-buyer-comac-plans-eyes-year-end-launch-2024-02-23/Lisa Barrington, Brenda Goh商业航空航天与国防
Fate of US aid to Ukraine package discussed on Taiwan trip, lawmakers sayA stalled U.S. bill on military aid to Ukraine which will also help fund weapons for Taiwan was discussed this week during a visit to Taipei by U.S. lawmakers, two of the participants said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:54:22 GMT NAHGJ4PVKFK4RPKXDBHAE7OVVE https://www.reuters.com/world/fate-us-aid-ukraine-package-discussed-taiwan-trip-lawmakers-say-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
Post-pandemic recovery fuels robust attendance - and hopes - at Singapore AirshowAs the bustling trade portion of the first fully post-pandemic Singapore Airshow wound down on Friday, exhibitors and delegates said they were optimistic for the aviation industry despite suppliers' struggles to keep up with the rebound in travel demand. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:43:42 GMT BVVQ2UWV6BJSDHGAJ4EFBU2L6I https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/post-pandemic-recovery-fuels-robust-attendance-hopes-singapore-airshow-2024-02-23/Xinghui Kok商业航空航天与国防
